en-US.title: Northwest Human Services, Salem
en-US.description: A comprehensive health and social services provider in Salem, Oregon. Services include medical, dental, and mental health on a sliding fee scale. The office also provides support for homeless youth and adults, offering access to basic needs services, case management, peer support, health care, and crisis support and suicide intervention. Serving the transgender community by providing an inclusive and non-discriminatory environment, where individuality in terms of gender identity and sexual orientation are respected.

address: 1233 Edgewater St NW, Salem, OR 97304, USA
